entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gore Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:34 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -25.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gore Bay-Manitoulin Airport 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -25.4°C
Pressure: 102.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 52 %
Wind Chill: -38
Dewpoint: -32.4°C
Wind: NNE 24 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 24 with temperature rising to minus 13 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then periods of light snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24 with temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill minus 31 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 late in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
